def: A phosphate of manganese and lithium; a variety of triphylite.
A rare zeolitic mineral occurring in white monoclinic crystalswith pearly luster. It is a hydrous silicate of aluminia, baryta, andstrontia.
Pertaining to phosphorite; resembling, or of the nature of,phosphorite.
The esculent swallow. See under Esculent.

Any one of numerous species of bright-colored American birdsbelonging to Icterus and allied genera, especially Icterus icterus, anative of the West Indies and South America. Many of the species arecalled orioles in America. [Written also troopial.]
One of the followers of Noetus, who lived in the third century.He denied the distinct personality of the Father, Son, and HolyGhost.
To apply astrology to; to study or practice astrology.
The unoin or articulation of bones to form a joint.
To sprinkle; to moisten by sprinkling; as, to sparge paper.
